data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
This module is similar in intent to the Test::Unit module, which is
    why it is similarly named. I believe it to be an easier way to do
    XUnit-style testing, and it is contained in one standalone module in
    contrast to Test::Unit's nearly 40 modules. It is also relatively
    small in size, which could allow a module author to easily include
    the module with her code instead of requiring the user to install it
    just for testing.

    It can run in conjunction with Test::Harness (via 'make test') or
    stand-alone.
